comment.body:
@Alex-302  sorry sir, but after you added the rule https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/165908#event-10985195207, I now get pop up cookies like this
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/37255346/1e6d1fde-32f5-428a-8390-061073a4d0aa)

and also,
even though I tried to go to https://racingnews365.com/las-vegas-unpacks-for-grand-prix-kerbstones-in-local-atmosphere-as-well
but I was redirected to https://racingnews365.com/las-vegas-unpacks-for-grand-prix-kerbstones-in-local-atmosphere-as-well#allow-cookieconsent

it adds #allow-cookieconsent to the end of the link address

Oh yes, it still happens even though I have updated the filter, cleared the browser cache, and deleted the cookies previously saved on the website https://racingnews365.com

comment.body:
Don't hide `.pickCreative_root`, some of them are part of contents. This is why I have added bunch of complex rules like
```
ameblo.jp###entryBody > div:not([class]):last-child > div:not([class]):last-child > table[border="0"] div.pickCreative_root
ameblo.jp###entryBody > div:not([class]):last-child > div.pickCreative_root
ameblo.jp###entryBody > div:not([class]):last-child > div:not([class]):last-child > div.pickCreative_root
```

comment.body:
@jellizaveta 
> Опера не принимает сертификат AdGuard. Пожалуйста, используйте другой браузер.

Начиная с 75-й версии опера может принимать пользовательские сертификаты центра СА и трафик там фильтруется с использованием ssl о AG.

> На первом скриншоте - это место для виджета с комментариями.

Виджет с блоком комментариев от дискам находится вверху,а снизу пустота.

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.hamitv.hamiand1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Djp.hamitv.hamiand1) ### Comment > Communication errors occur not in permanent program slots, but in live broadcast slots, such as international soccer matches. The word "LIVE" is displayed in the upper left corner of the thumbnail of such videos. > > Perhaps due to limitations of the TVer application caused by broadcasting rights and other rights-related issues, we were unable to take a screenshot of the scene where the communication error occurred. When I tried to take one, all I could get was a black screen. > > I remember that the communication error occurred even when the content blocking filter/DNS filtering/stealth mode was deactivated, so the communication error may have occurred because AdGuard for Android was running in VPN mode. It could also be a problem specific to the TVer app. > > Also, the communication error does not seem to occur all the time. I selected a completely different live stream and it took a while to load, but played without issue. I am not technically knowledgeable so this may be an inaccurate statement. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address



### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

pull_request.title: Update specific.txt
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Closes #166313

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

pull_request.title: Jetfilmizletv update
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

comment.body:
> Не работает блокировка рекламы на главной странице Яндекс браузера

Яндекс Браузер защищает рекламу Яндекса, т.к. свою, путём запрета доступа расширениям к страницам где используется их реклама. В полноценном Хроме этой проблемы нет.

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://football.kulichki.net/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ffootball.kulichki.net%2F) ### Comment > На сайте ФНК эта проблема возникает периодически (примерно раз в год). Вход на сайт (первый на дню) становится чуть замедленным и видна реклама сверху, вкрапление посередине и нижний ряд. Когда вход на сайт завершится, набирает обороты, но не сильно, количество блокированных AdGuard элементов, и бывает, исчезает верхний ряд, а бывает и нет, остальное остаётся. Если войти на сайт снова в течение дня – вход быстрый, рекламы нет, и виден только остаток рекламы, который исчезает лишь только стоит тронуть страницу сайта. Конечно, если AdGuard перетряхнуть, то есть именно на этом сайте выключить-включить, блокированных элементов становится намного больше и проблема исчезает, но психологический дискомфорт от ручного управления остаётся, не думаю, что так задумано. Username: `@Дед Вован` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Реклама блокируется корректно. Возможно мешает Яндекс браузер нормальной работе нашего расширения или другие сторонние расширения.
Например, эти `Антишок, Блокировка мешающей рекламы` можно отключить.

issue.title: kick out screen capture JavaScript
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

I've never seen a refusal to get such an operation situation, and it's equivalent to a declaration that a **virus** that captures screen in ms without any consent.

### Proposed solution

I feel the need to stop JavaScript to get cursor operations on the web page with filter.

### Additional information

In the electronic version of the Mainichi Shimbun, there was an article called "[Challenge to God: Aim at users with AI advertising, Japanese corporation representative of Apia Group](https://mainichi.jp/articles/20231015/k00/00m/040/073000c)" In this article, Koji Tachibana, the representative of Japan of the Apia Group, made a surprising statement.

>  You can determine how far you scrolled to the product page and the degree of interest in the product by the speed of scrolling. If you are interested in the product, you will read the product description carefully, so the scrolling will be slower. If you are interested, you can also trace around the product image with the cursor. Switching browser tabs is also an important element of knowing the level of interest.

I've never seen a refusal to get such an operation situation, and it's equivalent to a declaration that a **virus** that captures screen in ms without any consent.

comment.body: They don't watch your screen. They track position of the page. If you know sites with tracking, please report them.

comment.body: Hi, I just wanted to chime in as I've got this bug as well. It's only going on with the Adguard Annoyances filter. Disabling it shows the website contents, enabling it hides all the content. I've attached what I guess must be the log. If it isn't what you need, let me know. Best regards, /johnny
